thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Bit disappointing
thread.title_full: Bit disappointing - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PeteMcManus
title: Bit disappointing
text:
I've stayed Ina few holiday inns recently with work and have always left a little disappointed. This was no different.
The room was clean enough but very warm and the air con system wasn't working. The staff were friendly enough although most seemed to be training which dining help the speed of getting things done at a busy time.
Breakfast was included but I would have paid not too eat it if I'm honest, really disappointing. It isn't that hard to serve up a half decent breakfast but I'm afraid they missed the mark completely.
As with all hotels in London you end up paying ridiculous prices so I can't say it was good value either.
Overall a disappointing experience. In future I will be trying to find a Premier Inn.
